casebody.data:
Harry A. WILEY and Gerald D. Gilman
v.
L3 COMMUNICATIONS VERTEX AEROSPACE, LLC No. 29P17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 16, 2017 Garris Neil Yarborough, Attorney at Law, Fayetteville, H. Addison Winters, Attorney at Law, M. Nan Alessandra, Attorney at Law, Robert M. Kennedy, Jr., Attorney at Law, Raleigh, For L3 Communications Vertex Aerospace, LLC. Lee Tart Malone, Attorney at Law, Dunn, Robert A. Buzzard, Attorney at Law, Lillington, Ryan McKaig, Attorney at Law, For Wiley, Harry A., et al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 24th of January 2017 by Plaintiffs in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th of March 2017."
